name: Big Black Workflowy
description:
Very minimal dark theme.
All unnecessary links and distractions removed.
Comments in CSS for easy tweaking
Inspired by Better Dark Workflowy, Monokai.
additional_info:
12/07/2014 - Fixed help popup (wasn't closing properly)

12/02/2014 - Changed keyboard shortcuts from left side to right side, lowered height and made scrollable to avoid overlapping star icon

11/10/2014 - Removed old CSS. Added comments for clarity. Removed Workflowy footer. Made background black instead of dark gray.
